text: Agree with fellow reviewer. This place is a hidden gem. Meet the owners and staff, all are good ppl. Wish u guys much success!
Great coffee, Great times! Let's hope the customers seem to find this hidden gem. It really is a diamond in the rough espreso bar.

A great coffee shop that might still in its "secret" stage!  The employees are polite and helpful.  The latte was very well-made.  The chicken salad was the best I've ever had.  Nice interior, too.  Thanks!  Will be back!
